series_description: This series documents AdviceLine calls conducted by the of Employment Dispute Resolution (EDR) Consultant employment-related concerns of state employees, managers, and human resource representatives of the Commonwealth. This series may include, but is not limited to: notes.

This series documents the preparation and publication of an administrative ruling. This series may include, but is not limited to: parties' submissions, investigation documents, exhibits, consultant notes, ruling drafts, and final rulings.
retention_statement: 5 Years after end of state fiscal year

series_description: This series documents EDR's appointment of hearing officers and administration of the appointment process for each case. This series may include, but is not limited to: correspondence, hearing officer appointment forms, and grievance records.
retention_statement: 5 Years after end of state fiscal year

series_description: This series documents the grievances received by EDR which are qualified to advance to a hearing. This series may include, but is not limited to: the appointment packet, exhibits, administrative and judicial reviews, and all related correspondence.
retention_statement: 5 Years after end of state fiscal year

series_description: This series documents a system of appointment and training of hearing officers. This series may include, but is not limited to: correspondence, selection, evaluations, and tracking of any related training.
retention_statement: 10 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: This series documents the services provided to assist state employees in developing leadership effectiveness and workplace disputes through conflict management and intelligence coaching; individual and/or group consultation; and mediation services. This series may include, but is not limited to: requests for services, working papers, consent forms, feedback reports, action plans, evaluations, and correspondence.

This series documents the investigation into an allegation of retaliation for use or participation in the grievance procedure, reporting an allegation of fraud, waste, or abuse to the State Employee Fraud, Waste and Abuse Hotline. This series may include, but is not limited to:request for an investigation, interview notes, investigation notes, correspondence, and a report of the Office of Employee Dispute Resolution's findings. 2.2-1202.1(iii)

This series documents the investigation into an allegation of retaliation for use or participation in the grievance procedure, reporting an allegation of fraud, waste, or abuse to the State Employee Fraud, Waste and Abuse Hotline. This series may include, but is not limited to: request for an investigation, interview notes, investigation notes, correspondence, and a report of EDR's findings.
